column7: Stung Treng Forestry Administration Officers seized illegally poached wildlife meat in Stung Treng’s Samaki Market.------Hun Sam Oeun
column8: deputy director of the Stung Treng Forestry Administration
column9: said that the crackdown on the above meat seizure seized a total weight of 40 kg
column10: which appears to have included deer
column11: wild boar and civet cat.------The trader managed to escape the market before  forces arrived. All the meat was then taken to Stung Treng’s Forestry Administration compound. ------AREY NEWS
